doc.title: TeXML Quick Start
doc.p: TeXML is an XML vocabulary for TeX. A processor translates TeXML source into TeX. This document provides a quick start for using TeXML.

sect.title: Installation
sect.p: Python is a programming language. Download a production version of Python at the http://python.org/download/. Install it as any other Windows program.

Download TeXML from the project download area. If you work under Windows then you need zip-file, if you work under Unix then you can prefer tar.gz-file. A distribution package is an archived file. Unpack it, for example, into the folder c:\texml.
